vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.24.8;
father of: Nehushta (H5179)
§ Elnathan = "God has given"
1) king Jehoiachin's maternal grandfather
2) three chief men in Ezra's time
3) son of Achbor, a military commander under Jehoiakim
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   padre de Nehustá, esposa del rey Joaquim; (b)   hijo de Acbor; funcionario; en tiempos del rey Joaquim; (c)   jefe; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利拿單 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "神已賜給"
1) 約雅斤王的外祖父 (王下 24:8)
2) 以斯拉時代有三位首領叫這個名字 (拉 8:16)
3) 亞革波的兒子, 約雅敬王麾下的一位軍長 (耶 26:22)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以利拿单 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "神已赐给"
1) 约雅斤王的外祖父 (王下 24:8)
2) 以斯拉时代有三位首领叫这个名字 (拉 8:16)
3) 亚革波的儿子, 约雅敬王麾下的一位军长 (耶 26:22)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.8.16a
§ Elnathan = "God has given"
1) king Jehoiachin's maternal grandfather
2) three chief men in Ezra's time
3) son of Achbor, a military commander under Jehoiakim
